page.title: 11A Girl's School Outing
page.content: After lunch we went on our trip and while we were walking I had to look out for the drains but I did two rubbings of the drains and then I had to draw all of the rest and then we went home. Sarah Field age 9 When we stopped on the seafront Miss Long said stop and sit down.Then she said up there is the Coast Guard House.When we were half way up Tyedean Road the rain started so we ran up the hill to shelter under the church.Then some drips came down off the roof. So Alex asked Miss Long if he could go and see if his mother was in.Miss Long said yes.So he went to see if his mother was in.His mother wasn't in. So Sarah asked if she could go and see if her mum was in, she was so we sheltered there. Suzanne Hampson age 9
